hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Umair, the freed slave of Aabi Lahm, said:"My master used to give me food and I would feed others from it, then he stopped me," or he said: "He beat me. So I asked the Prophet,” -or- "he asked him and I said: 'I will not stop.' He said: 'Both of you will be rewarded

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا لِلْعَبْدِ أَنْ يُعْطِيَ وَيَتَصَدَّقَ
chapter.eng-name: What A Slave May Give Away And Give In Charity
